title: Chintz Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for red (over resist) gray, purple and black applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. (chintz)
description: Design of curving vine alternate with overlapping mounds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for red (over resist) gray, purple and black applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. (chintz). Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-4.
